channel.title: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?
channel.description:
I couldn't directly found any Apply Form for the Team so I'm asking: Does the mod Team still require any Texture Artists or anyone who's known with the Source Engine for over 5 years ?
If they still need to would anyone please redirect me to the place where I do this?
Thanks in advance, regards Rafaël De Jongh [url]https://rafaeldejongh.tk[/url]

item.title: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?
item.dc:creator: striker
item.description:
I stand corrected.

Read full topic

item.title: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?
item.dc:creator: ManlyStump
item.description:
Mabilis:

The website doesn’t make it obvious you CAN scroll (horizontal).

Agreed, using a vertical scroll motion to move horizontally is completely counter-intuitive. Not to mention the horizontal scrollbar at the foot of the page is really hard to spot. Also the “return to top” thing uses a page reload, why not just anchor it to the beginning?

Hopefully these are all things you can solve when you redesign your portfolio. I must say your work looks pretty good, so ought to have a portfolio that doesn’t let down the content!

Read full topic
item.source: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?

item.title: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?
item.dc:creator: Jethrosoup
item.description:
Boba Fett:

I couldn’t directly found any Apply Form for the Team so I’m asking: Does the mod Team still require any Texture Artists or anyone who’s known with the Source Engine for over 5 years ?

If they still need to would anyone please redirect me to the place where I do this?

Thanks in advance, regards Rafaël De Jongh
https://rafaeldejongh.tk

FINALLY

A website that allows me to use my side-clicky MMB. All this web 2.0 resizing websites to fit your window BS has got me in a tizzy.

Read full topic

item.source: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?

item.title: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Boba Fett:

Thanks, but the scrollbar is made like that, it uses javascript to make the normal scrollbar “vertical” to scroll horizontal so it would be as easy to just scroll down to go to the side, as for the name it was my previous screen name that now changed to my original name that’s why the last releases actually got my real name and not my screen name!

Though thanks for your interest and suggestions, this is rather a old portfolio of mine ±9months old so I’m going to change it soon.

Thanks for the suggestions though!

Why would you try and seek work with a 9 month old portfolio? Surely showing your latest work would make a lot more sense?

Read full topic

item.source: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?

item.title: Does the team need more Texture Artists ?
item.dc:creator: Boba_Fett
item.description:
Trigger_Proximity:

I have some criticisms about your website. Constructive ones though.

Rather than forcing people to use their browsers horizontal scrollbar, put one on the page, where it’s supposed to be used anyway. Also, in your projects page, don’t refer to yourself as Boba Fett. Sure it’s your screenname but shit son, use your real name on your portfolio.

Thanks, but the scrollbar is made like that, it uses javascript to make the normal scrollbar “vertical” to scroll horizontal so it would be as easy to just scroll down to go to the side, as for the name it was my previous screen name that now changed to my original name that’s why the last releases actually got my real name and not my screen name!

Though thanks for your interest and suggestions, this is rather a old portfolio of mine ±9months old so I’m going to change it soon.

Thanks for the suggestions though!

Read full topic
